Master Euline:
Greetings! Are you familiar with the Elven art of war? Our movements may seem soft and graceful to the uninitiated, but there is a hidden strength to them. Consider the power of river and wind: they can erode mountains and carve canyons in the earth's floor.
Our training teaches the value of patience and skill. In the face of an experienced Elven Warrior, not even the mightiest Orc can long persevere!
Learn skills.
Ask about Skill Enchanting.
